defaultView.title: Likes and passes
defaultView.text: See the number of likes and dislikes that you made over time.

defaultView.title: App openings
defaultView.text: See the number of times that you opened the app (per day or per month).

defaultView.title: Likes, passes, messages
defaultView.text: Compare the number of likes, passes, messages sent and messages received.

defaultView.title: Pairs
defaultView.text: Compare different pairs of values in a donut chart.

defaultView.title: Likes and passes correlation
defaultView.text: Observe the possible correlation between the number of likes/passes and the number of times you open the app.

defaultView.title: All data
defaultView.text: If you want to inspect precisely the values for each day, all the data can be summarized in a table.
